sentences.english: The Precambrian metamorphic rocks in Northern Fujian are the important part consisting of the Cathaysian palaeocontinental basement.

sentences.english: He proposed to rebuild ethical education, by neatening customs to save Xanadu civilization.

sentences.english: " China is "the world" center of civilization, there is no need to learn from living overseas.

sentences.english: Yandi and Huangdi are the legendary ancestors of the Chinese nation.

sentences.english: Chinese language and writing is also an important feature of Chinese culture.

sentences.english: It’s Huaxia music and dance, It’s Chnese traditional music and dance.

sentences.english: But at that time Chinese ancestors, are also being gradually the transition to the patriarchal society.
